rukus.text: korolʹ skazav, "ya pobachyv semy zhyrnykh koriv pohlynalysʹ sʹoma skinny korovamy, ta sʹoma zelenymy spikes (pshenytsi), ta inshi shriveled. O miy elders, radyte meni vidnosno moyeyi mriyi, yakshcho vy znayete yak interpretuvaty sny
Vony skazaly, "Bez·hluzdya sny. Koly yomu prybuvaye do interpretatsiyi sniv, my ne knowledgeable
khto buv vryatovanyy (z tyurmy) skazav, zaraz shcho vin nareshti zapam'yatav, "ya mozhu kazaty vam yoho interpretatsiyu, tak posylayete meni (Joseph)

Joseph miy tovarysh, informuyutʹ nas pro semy zhyrnykh koriv pohlynayutʹsya sʹoma skinny korovamy, ta sʹoma zelenymy spikes, ta inshi shriveled. YA bazhayu poyikhaty nazad z deyakoyu informatsiyeyu dlya lyudey
Vin skazav, "Shcho vy kulʹtyvuyete protyahom nastupnykh semy rokiv, koly chas urozhayu prybuvaye, lyshayete zerna u yikhnʹomu spikes, krim za shcho vy hostytesya
Pislya choho, sim rokiv posukhy prybude, kotryy spozhyye bilʹshistʹ shcho vy zberehly dlya nykh
Pislya choho, rik prybude shcho prynosytʹ polehshennya dlya lyudey, ta vony budutʹ, shche raz, davlyatʹ sik
